definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (cf. Aram. [[גֻּבָּא]] den, and guwbo0, Ar. jub=un, Eth. gb: As. gubbu, well, cistern, v. [[גבב]])—field of battle with Philistines 2Sa 21:18 = [[גֶּזֶר]] in ‖ 1Ch 20:4 (so here Th Ew; cf. Jos 10:33), but = [[גַּת]] LXX SyrVer 2Sa 21:18 (LXXL Gazeq); 2Sa 21:19 (om. ‖ 1Ch 20:5), LXX Rom, Rob; Klo Gath; in v:2Sa 21:16 We Dr (q. v.) rd. [[בְּגׁב]] for [[בְּנׁב]]; site of Gob (si vera l.) unknown.
